headline: Is Clorox (CLX) Now Offering Value After Recent Share Price Rebound?
summary: Wondering if Clorox is fairly priced after a bumpy few years, or if the current share price is quietly offering value that the market has not fully appreciated yet? The stock last closed at US$125.95, with returns of 6.9% over 7 days, 17.7% over 30 days and 24.9% year to date. Over longer periods, the 1-year, 3-year and 5-year returns stand at an 11.8% decline, 9.0% decline and 21.0% decline respectively. Recent headlines around Clorox have focused on how the company is repositioning its...

headline: Is Clorox’s (CLX) Margin Squeeze Reshaping Its Capital Return Playbook?
summary: In early February 2026, The Clorox Company reported past second-quarter results showing sales of US$1,673 million and net income of US$157 million, both slightly lower than a year earlier, alongside updates on its long-running share repurchase program. These figures highlight how Clorox is balancing softer demand and margin pressure with capital returns and the final stages of its ERP rollout and integration work. We’ll now explore how these mixed results, particularly the ongoing margin...
